body: At 8th level, the cavalier can draw on his dedication to overcome physical weakness. Whenever the cavalier does not move more than a 5-foot step, he receives a +2 dodge bonus to his CMD to resist bull rush, overrun, reposition, and trip combat maneuvers until his next turn.
name: I Shall Not Be Moved
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Cavalier/Cavalier Orders/Order of the Seal/Order Abilities/I Shall Not Be Moved
